title: Discipling Your Grandchildren
itunes:summary:
To influence your grandchild's faith, start by establishing a strong relationship. John and Danny offer tips for relating to grandchildren of all ages. Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast. Or, call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

A Spiritual Heritage: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/singleitem/checkout/donation/item/don-fofp-podcast-2020-09-24#refcd=1004602

Get More Episode Resources: https://focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/discipling-your-grandchildren/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
